channel.title: Hospitality on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Hospitality on FinanClub

item.title: LVS
item.description: score:66 Chances: Las Vegas Sands (LVS) fourth-quarter results are likely to reflect strong customer demand and robust spending. Las Vegas Sands (LVS) possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Improved visitation in Macao and Singapore and the expansion of non-gaming amenities will aid Las Vegas Sands (LVS).

item.title: HST
item.description: score:86 Chances: Recovery in group and business transient travel demand, capital-recycling efforts and healthy balance sheet strength are likely to drive Host Hotels’ performance in the quarters ahead. The pause in interest rate hikes and the likelihood of interest rate cuts in 2024 have generated strong appreciation of REITs, including Host Hotels, across multiple subsectors.
